events.message: The insured reported a car accident on highway causing significant front-end damage.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident cluster after verifying the keywords in the initial report.
An agent with expertise in vehicle collision claims was assigned to manage the case.
We have acknowledged receipt of the claim and started the initial review process.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates from the customer.
Received all requested documents including police report, detailed photos, and repair quotes.
Investigation began to verify the details of the collision and assess damages to the insured vehicle.
Investigation concluded confirming the insured was not at fault and damages are extensive.
A settlement offer was prepared covering repairs and compensation for the vehicle damage.
The insured confirmed acceptance of the proposed settlement and appreciated the quick response.
The claim was officially approved following customer's acceptance of the settlement terms.
Claim payment was processed and issued to the insured for vehicle repair expenses.
The claim case was closed after successful payment and confirmation of repair completion.
All claim documents and records were archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
